resources.string: YOUR TIME ON EARTH IS LIMITED SPEND IT WISELY
Write Your One important Goal you have to Achieve today

How to use 

 1) First Write down you most important task you wanted to complete 

until then you phone will be partially locked to use for you phones addiction 


2)then set timer for you task how much time you want to restrict yourself from accessing the phone


3)then select the HARDCORE OR SOFTCORE spartan you wanted to be


HARDCORE spartan :- 
 if you want to restrict the access of you addiction from phone you have to chose it will restrict any kind of use of your phone apps social media or anything that distract you


SOFTCORE SPARTAN :- if you wanted to use your phone but also wanted to restrict access of your phone so you should chose this as you can occasionally use your phone


Click Cancel :- 
 so you can set new timer and to remove the restriction also
only Timer left Focus on you task
" What Task You Doing Now is Important For You Stick To It"
